name: AntVentor: Point & Click Quest
description:
"AntVentor is a point and click puzzle adventure indie game about an idle ant inventor and his unusual adventure quest. It is the first short chapter of the AntTrilogy series in story mode. Find hidden objects which will help you in puzzle solving. Great graphics, artwork and gorgeous animations will blow your mind! Enjoy in vivid animations and engaging ant game play!

Are you ready for the ant adventure quest? Help this smart ant in puzzle solving and surviving the outside world! Get prepared for funny story!

Florantine is the smart ant inventor, but he is also an idle ant. He lives in an anthill, and he lived a simple ant life, until you showed up, broke his mechanism and ruined his plan. Now you have to do whatever it takes to help Florantine not only return to his ant life, but also fulfill his long-cherished dream and start his adventure quest.

His dreams is to escape ant colony, to experience the ant life outside the anthill. He wants to explore the macroworld! Just point and click, and start the puzzle adventure!

🐜Do you want to:🐜
✔ Feel what it's like to be the size of an ant, who is leaving his ant colony?
✔ Plunge into a unique and surprisingly photo-realistic macroworld outside of the anthill?
✔ Shamelessly intrude into the life of the main character?
✔ Meet Florantine: a funny, but slightly arrogant smart ant?
✔ Laugh at the game’s many comical moments, with a storyline full of humor?
✔ Meet scary and cute, huge and tiny inhabitants of the macroworld and enjoy ant adventure quest?
✔ Enjoy scrupulously crafted animation and beautiful artwork, consisting of more than 15,000 frames?
✔ Appreciate the absence of tedious puzzles, usually created just for taking up your time?
✔ Show your puzzle solving skills and find hidden objects?
✔ Enjoy in humor, funny stories and vivid animations?
✔ Be fascinated by the simple, but a very exciting puzzle adventure storyline with a twist ending?
✔ Skip the long dialogues, simply because they do not exist in the game?
✔ Listen to original atmospheric bass music?
✔ Play point and click adventure games in story mode?

If at least one of your answers is ""yes"", then this puzzle adventure game is for you! Enjoy in the great artwork and engaging storyline!

We are proud on our ant game awards and nominations:

★ Best Game Design Nominee - Indie Prize - USA 2018
★ Best Visual Art Nominee - Play - Bilbao 2018

Download the AntVentor now, and begin the ant adventure quest! Just point and click!
